attributes.action: look in to  the benefits for new unenpolyed who have payed there tax and national insurance for the last 10years BUT still are only intitled to the miniman allowance in that the same as any obne who has been unemployed for thwe last 10 years but has put nothing in to the scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have just been made unemployed i have been informed that my allowance as a married man will be £100.00 a week but i have for the last 10 years paid on average tax of £20,000 and national insurance of £5,000 a year and also spent $40,000 a year in to the encomany 
due to the present climent the goverment should change the benifit system in line with the rest of europe (they wont us to vote in it)where they recieve 75% of there annule income 
we should recieve they same standars as the rest of europe
